testimonials.name: John Smith
testimonials.title: Tech Lead at TechCorp
testimonials.text: Sanjay is an exceptional full-stack developer who consistently delivers high-quality solutions. His expertise in React and Node.js is impressive.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.title: Engineering Manager
testimonials.text: Working with Sanjay was a pleasure. His deep understanding of data pipelines and cloud architecture helped us optimize our entire workflow.

testimonials.name: Mike Chen
testimonials.title: CTO at StartupX
testimonials.text: Sanjay's contributions to our project were invaluable. His ability to architect scalable solutions and mentor team members sets him apart.
